Title: Prohibits the governor from granting themselves or any person involved with furthering the illegal conduct of the governor a reprieve, commutation or pardon
Summary: Prohibits the governor from granting themselves or any person involved with furthering the illegal conduct of the governor a reprieve, commutation or pardon.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 4 of article 4 of the constitution, in relation to prohibiting the governor from granting themselves or any person involved with furthering the illegal conduct of the governor a reprieve, commutation or pardon
